name: Super Smash Bros.
overview:
Super Smash Bros. NES's gameplay is very similar to that of the official Super Smash Bros games. In this one, Mario, Kirby, Samus, Link, Mega Man and Ninja Gaiden's Ryu duke it out.

Unlike other fighting games, damage is measured by percentage and fighting focuses more on hitting enemies off the stage. The higher the percentage, the easier it is to knock enemies off the stage.
